revised_title: Genetic Analysis of Shell Color and Patterns in Cepaea nemoralis
tldr: This study investigates the genetics of various morphs and varieties of the snail species Cepaea nemoralis. The authors describe the genetics of shell colors such as white lip, faint pink, pale brown, and yellow-white, as well as the banding patterns and the suppression of the band in mid-banded snails. The research provides insights into the genetic basis of the polymorphism in this species.
